briefTitle: Demographics, Characteristics and Outcomes of Male Breast Cancer Patients at Methodist Health System
officialTitle: Demographics, Characteristics and Outcomes of Male Breast Cancer Patients at Methodist Health System
conditions: Ductal Carcinoma in Situ, Invasive Lobular Breast Carcinoma
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Diagnosis Rates of patients with MBC and FBC
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* • ≥ 18 years of age Patients diagnosed with ductal carcinoma in situ or invasive lobular carcinoma of the breast

Exclusion Criteria:

* 18 years of age

  * Prisoners
  * Pregnant or breastfeeding
